Description:
Detects restricted access to applications by the Software Restriction Policies (SRP) policy

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Restricted Software Access By SRP
Query: sourcetype="windows-application" provider_name="Microsoft-Windows-SoftwareRestrictionPolicies" (eventid="865" OR eventid="866" OR eventid="867" OR eventid="868" OR eventid="882")
